title: The community
body: ok i know there must be many other people out there who feel the same way but lately in the last 2 weeks of league i have been having problems..... and i don't mean the game i love league and i love to play it but the people... i agree that people have bad games and so fourth and i know when i talk about this there is nothing that anyone can do but i just kinda need to know there are others who think the same. But people in the games im playing with are so toxic and they dc cause there angry or just to piss off the friendly team, its a joke and i have lost all hope in the reporting thing league does cause it feels like nothings being done. I get that you cant ban everyone who gets a ban next to there name and i respect that but is there anyone who can give me something to work off like sure, im not the prefect player either i dont mean to put that across but im asking why isnt there being anything done?

replies.body:
You're Not alone...
and the reporting system doesn't do anything.

Robots. AI.

OP.

I don't think cases are individually reviewed anymore, except in extreme cases.

If you want a robot to robotically review a particular case, you can send in a support ticket about it. Takes a bit of time, though, and usually nothing gets done about it.
